 * @description Renders a list of pathways for the current project. Each item links to its respective PathwayPlayerPage.
 * @param {object} props - Component props.
 * @param {Array<object>} props.pathways - An array of pathway objects to be displayed.
 * @returns {JSX.Element} - The list of pathways.
 */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PathwayList=_ref=>{let{pathways}=_ref;if(!pathways||pathways.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"No pathways found for this project."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-3",children:"Pathways"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"space-y-2",children:pathways.map(pathway=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"p-4 border rounded shadow-sm flex justify-between items-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/pathways/${pathway._id}`,className:"text-blue-600 hover:underline",children:pathway.title})},pathway._id))})]});};export default PathwayList;
